member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.AddItemToSession
member.summary: Adds a specified item to the set of items currently being synchronized.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the item to add. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. Returns E_INVALIDARG if pszItemID is already part of the session.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.CanContinue
member.summary: Determines whether the synchronization has been canceled.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the ID of the item.

listheader.description: A cancellation has not been requested. The synchronization can continue.
A cancellation has been requested. The handler should call , specifying SYNCMGR_PS_CANCELED in the nStatus parameter.
The value pointed to by pszItemID is either unknown to Sync Center or is not an item managed by this handler.

returns.para: If pszItemID is NULL or an empty string, the return value depends on whether a cancellation has been requested for the entire handler.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.CommitItem
member.summary: Confirms a specified item as a member of the handler's sync set and confirms that it should be shown in the UI.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the item to confirm. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. Returns E_INVALIDARG if the item has not been first submitted through or if the item is already part of the current session.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.ProposeItem
member.summary: Proposes the addition of a new item to the set of items previously enumerated.
member.param: A pointer to an instance of representing the new item.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. Returns E_INVALIDARG if pszItemID already exists.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.QueryForAdditionalItems
member.summary: Retrieves an enumerator of the set of items that have a pending request to be synchronized. This is the set of items that will be synchronized after the current synchronization is finished.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an instance of that enumerates sync item IDs. This value is NULL if no items are pending.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an instance of enumerating interfaces that are passed to or . This value is NULL if no interfaces are pending.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. Returns S_FALSE if no items are pending.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.ReportEvent
member.summary: Provides an event to add to the Sync Results folder for an item being synchronized.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that contains the unique ID of the item currently being synchronized. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A value from the enumeration declaring the type of event involved.
Not used.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the name of the event.
A pointer to a buffer that contains a description of the event.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the text to be used in a hyperlink to the item. This parameter can be NULL
A pointer to a buffer that contains the URL of the item. This parameter can be NULL
Handler-specific data to associate with the event.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to a unique ID for the event.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.ReportManualSync
member.summary: Reports that a synchronization operation is being performed that was requested manually from outside the Sync Center UI.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.ReportProgress
member.summary: Reports the progress of the synchronization of a single sync item to Sync Center.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the item currently being synchronized. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
A pointer to a buffer containing a Unicode string for any custom progress messaging for this item.
A value from the enumeration stating the current progress status of the synchronization.
The current step in the synchronization. If the flag is set in nStatus, this parameter is ignored.
The total number of steps required to complete the synchronization of the item. If the flag is set in nStatus, this parameter is ignored.
When this method returns, points to a value from the enumeration specifying the nature of a cancel request, if any.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback.SetHandlerProgressText
member.summary: Sets the content of an information field for the handler while that handler is performing a synchronization.
member.param: Pointer to a buffer containing the comment text.
A value from the enumeration specifying the nature of a cancel request, if any.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncCallback
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow a synchronization process to report progress and events to Sync Center, or to query whether the process has been canceled.
